description: This operation allows you to get all quotes made in the liquidity provider, and with that make the reconciliation with the data obtained in the LedgerDetail endpoint.

queryParameters.name: LiquidityUserId
queryParameters.description: Is possible to connect with more than one Liquidity Provider. To search trades from an specific liquidity, send LiquidityUserId which can be obtained from the endpoint v1/api/broker/liquidities.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.

description: Retrieves basic information for each entry recorded in the company ledger.

queryParameters.name: transaction_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of the funding, whether it is a "ORDER, a "WITHDRAW" or a "DEPOSIT".

queryParameters.name: user_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.

description: Retrivies comprehensive details for each entry recorded in the company ledger.

queryParameters.name: transaction_type
queryParameters.description: Specifies the type of the funding, whether it is a "ORDER", a "WITHDRAW" or a "DEPOSIT".

queryParameters.name: user_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: page_number
queryParameters.description: Specifies the page number from which the request will start.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.

description: Records a deposit entry on the company's ledger, documenting the transaction and associated details.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

description: Records a withdrawal entry on the company's ledger, documenting the transaction and associated details.

pathParameters.name: user_id
pathParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company

description: Retrivies comprehensive details for each entry recorded in the company ledger.

queryParameters.name: user_id
queryParameters.description: Specifies the ID of the end-user generated by the company.

queryParameters.name: page_size
queryParameters.description: Specifies the number of items displayed per page in the paginated result. We strongly recommend using a maximum value of 1000 per request. If additional data extraction is required, we suggest retrieving the report instead.

queryParameters.name: last_id
queryParameters.description: Indicates the ID of the last data item on the last page. It is used to fetch the next page in the subsequent request.

queryParameters.name: date_from
queryParameters.description: Formats Accepts: ["YYYY-MM-DD", "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS"], The maximum interval is 30 days, depending on the date_to value.
